{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3534809,"name":"6894 Lead prog/driver","username":"Mochatitan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mochatitan/{size}/237112_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-20T23:12:58.549Z","cooked":"

We are trying to configure our swerve generator for CTRE, and we have all the requirements.

Screenshot 2025-02-20 1802182559×1513 260 KB

We setup all the motors and cancoders, and we went through all the tests and verifications and got full checkmarks, but it would not let us continue.

Our gyro name is red (pigeon 2), which is given us alot of concern, and we have calibrated the pigeon using phoenix tuner. SOS

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-02-20T23:22:50.035Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":97,"readers_count":96,"score":44.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":492509,"topic_slug":"ctre-swerve-generator-not-working","display_username":"6894 Lead prog/driver","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63063,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"6894 | Lead prog/Driver"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-swerve-generator-not-working/492509/1","custom_user_title":"6894 | Lead prog/Driver","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3534815,"name":"Miles.D","username":"jom","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/jom/{size}/256684_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-20T23:30:45.215Z","cooked":"

Is the gyro on the same canbus as the swerve motors and cancoders?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-02-20T23:30:52.880Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":78,"readers_count":77,"score":55.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":492509,"topic_slug":"ctre-swerve-generator-not-working","display_username":"Miles.D","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":68136,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3039 Team captain"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-swerve-generator-not-working/492509/2","custom_user_title":"3039 Team captain","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3534818,"name":"Dalton","username":"daltzsmith","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/daltzsmith/{size}/206287_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-20T23:34:14.919Z","cooked":"

The icon next to the selected icon is the icon that indicates that the Pigeon 2 is not on the same CAN bus as the rest of the devices. If you hover over the icon, it should tint and also mention that information.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":10,"updated_at":"2025-02-20T23:34:14.919Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":72,"readers_count":71,"score":44.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":492509,"topic_slug":"ctre-swerve-generator-not-working","display_username":"Dalton","primary_group_name":"CTRE","flair_name":"CTRE","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/1/b/1bd2b430e1bb6427d1c6504ff6abcd31de851a6d.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":57,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":61981,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"CTR Electronics"},"post_url":"/t/ctre-swerve-generator-not-working/492509/3","custom_user_title":"CTR Electronics","reactions":[{"id":"+1","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3534822,"name":"6894 Lead prog/driver","username":"Mochatitan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/mochatitan/{size}/237112_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-20T23:41:27.369Z","cooked":"

no, the gyro is on the rio canbus and the motors are on a seperate CANivore

we got the thing completed, but now the drive train goes absurdly fast and also jitters when it turns. Do you know what could be causing this? the jittering is really bad. it sounds like popcorn.

are the swerves greased? if not that strawberry jam will smooth it out
